Plot: A young woman travels to Texas to collect an inheritance; little does she know that an encounter with a chainsaw-wielding killer is part of the reward.
Title: Texas Chainsaw 3D
Writer: Adam Marcus (screenplay), Debra Sullivan (screenplay), Kirsten McCallion (screenplay), Stephen Susco (story), Adam Marcus (story), Debra Sullivan (story), Kim Henkel (characters), Tobe Hooper (characters)
Actors: Alexandra Daddario, Dan Yeager, Trey Songz, Scott Eastwood
tomatoConsensus: As an ugly and cynical attempt to rebrand Leatherface as horror anti-hero, Texas Chainsaw 3D is a bold move for the franchise.
